raw: Coronavirus: Hong Kong confirms 16 new cases with health officials to probe possible infection spread in city’s entertainment hub of Lan Kwai Fong .
replaced: Coronavirus: Hong Kong confirms 16 new cases with health officials to probe possible infection spread in the nightlife hub of Lan Kwai Fong  Lan Kwai Fong .

raw: Hong Kong health officials say they will investigate the possible spread of infection in bars , restaurants and gyms in the city 's entertainment hotspot of Soho as they recorded 16 new coronavirus cases on Thursday , three of whom had visited the nightlife hub of Lan Kwai Fong .
replaced: Hong Kong health officials  Hong Kong health officials say Hong Kong health officials will investigate the possible spread of infection in bars , restaurants and gyms in the city 's entertainment hotspot of Soho  the city entertainment hotspot of Soho as Hong Kong health officials recorded The new cases on Thursday , three of whom had visited the nightlife hub of Lan Kwai Fong  Lan Kwai Fong .

raw: Two other patients confirmed a day earlier had previously visited the area .

raw: “ We are looking at whether there is a spread among bars and restaurants in Lan Kwai Fong , ” she said , during the daily press conference .

raw: The latest additions take the total number of people infected in Hong Kong to 208 , with four fatalities .
replaced: The latest additions take the total number of people infected in Hong Kong to 208 , with four fatalities .

raw: The new cases were announced after the city on Wednesday confirmed 25 more people were infected , the most recorded in a single day , and as Hongkongers rushed back before the government ’s toughest quarantine measures yet against Covid-19 came into force at midnight .
replaced: The new cases were announced after the city on Wednesday confirmed 25 more people were infected , the most recorded in a single day , and as Hongkongers rushed back before the government ’s toughest quarantine measures yet against Covid-19 came into force at midnight .

raw: From Thursday , all arrivals from overseas into Hong Kong must undergo 14 - day self - isolation at home or in quarantine centres followed by two weeks of medical surveillance .
replaced: From Thursday , all arrivals from overseas into Hong Kong must undergo 14 - day self - isolation at home or in quarantine centres followed by two weeks of medical surveillance .

raw: Arrivals from mainland China are already required to self - isolate at home .
replaced: Arrivals from mainland China are already required to self - isolate at home .

raw: Crowds built up in the arrival halls of Hong Kong International Airport early on Thursday as the measures were rolled out , which require people to wear a wristband so they can be monitored .

raw: At least eight hotels have offered a total of 1,000 rooms to bolster Hong Kong ’s quarantine facilities , with health officials voicing concerns the city would run out of capacity over the coming weeks because of the influx of Hongkongers returning to the city .
